name: rudi_local_id
displayName: Identifier in the data producer system

name: rudi_doi
displayName: Digital object identifier of the provider

name: rudi_abstract
displayName: Short description for the whole dataset

name: rudi_summary
displayName: More precise description for the whole dataset

name: rudi_theme
displayName: Category for thematic classification of the data

name: rudi_keywords
displayName: List of tags that can be used to retrieve the data

name: rudi_producer
displayName: Entity that produces the data on the Producer node

name: rudi_producer_organization_id
displayName: Unique identifier of the organization in RUDI system

name: rudi_producer_organization_name
displayName: Updated offical name of the organization

name: rudi_producer_organization_address
displayName: Updated offical postal address of the organization

name: rudi_producer_organization_caption
displayName: Explicit/complete name for an acronym, or alternative name of the organization

name: rudi_contact
displayName: Address to ask details on the dataset and its production

name: rudi_contact_organization_name
displayName: Updated offical name of the organization

name: rudi_contact_name
displayName: Updated name of the service, or possibly the person

name: rudi_contact_role
displayName: Updated status of the contact person

name: rudi_media_visual
displayName: Link towards a (low-fidelity) visualization of the Media

name: rudi_media_connector_interface_contract
displayName: Link towards the interface contract defined with RUDI Portal

name: rudi_media_connector_connector_parameters
displayName: Additional parameters that can be used to refine the call to the URL

name: rudi_mediafile_structure
displayName: Link towards the resource that describes the structure of the data

name: rudi_mediafile_checksum_algo
displayName: Method for computing the integrity hash of the data

name: rudi_mediaseries_latency
displayName: Theorical delay between the production of the record and its availability in milliseconds

name: rudi_mediaseries_period
displayName: Theorical delay between the production of two records in milliseconds

name: rudi_mediaseries_current_size
displayName: Actual size of the data in bytes

name: rudi_mediaseries_total_size
displayName: Estimated total size of the data in bytes

name: rudi_mediaservice_api_documentation_url
displayName: Link towards the resource that describes the structure of the API

name: rudi_temporal_spread
displayName: Period of time described by the data

name: rudi_geography_geographic_distribution
displayName: Precise geographic distribution of the data

name: rudi_geography_projection
displayName: Cartographic projection used to describe the data

name: rudi_dataset_dates
displayName: Dates of the actions performed on the data

name: rudi_storage_status
displayName: Status of the storage of the dataset

name: rudi_metadata_info_provider_organization_caption
displayName: Explicit/complete name for an acronym, or alternative name of the organization

name: rudi_metadata_info_contact_id
displayName: Unique identifier of the metadata contact

name: rudi_metadata_info_contact_organization_name
displayName: Updated offical name of the organization metadata contact

name: rudi_metadata_info_contact_name
displayName: Updated name of the service, or possibly the person

name: rudi_metadata_info_contact_role
displayName: Updated status of the metadata contact person

name: rudi_metadata_info_contact_email
displayName: E-mail address of the metadata contact

name: rudi_access_condition
displayName: Access restrictions for the use of data in the form of licence, confidentiality, terms of service, habilitation or required rights, economical model. Default is open licence. #TODO: to be defined. Possible redundencies with other fields!

name: rudi_access_condition_confidentiality_restricted_access
displayName: True if the dataset has a restricted access. False for open data

name: rudi_access_condition_confidentiality_gdpr_sensitive
displayName: True if the dataset embeds personal data

name: rudi_access_condition_usage_constraint
displayName: Describes how constrained is the use of the resource

name: rudi_access_condition_bibliographical_reference
displayName: Information that MUST be cited every time the data is used, most likely a BibTeX entry

name: rudi_access_condition_mandatory_mention
displayName: Mention that must be cited verbatim in every publication that makes use of the data

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_selfdata_access
displayName: Mode d'accès aux données personnelles. Dans Rudi, les données personnelles sont transmises de manière automatisé par API (CU déchets) ou de manière manuelle en dehors de Rudi (CU Champs libres).

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_storage_period_unit
displayName: Unité utilisée pour la valeur de la période.

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_selfdata_held
displayName: Liste des données détenues. Le producteur peut indiquer la liste des attributs de son jdd selfdata.

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_treatment_period_unit
displayName: Unité utilisée pour la valeur de la période.

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_deletable_data
displayName: Données effaçables. Champ indiquant s'il est possible de faire une demande d'effacement sur ce jdd.

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_deletion_reason
displayName: Motif de non effacement des données. Le producteur peut choisir un motif parmi une liste de motif (cf. article 17 §3 de la CNIL : https://www.cnil.fr/fr/reglement-europeen-protection-donnees/chapitre3#Article17).

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_matching_data
displayName: Liste des données pivot. Les données pivot sont les données nécessaires pour identifier un citoyen de manière unique et sure dans le jdd. Dans le portail, lorsqu'un citoyen souhaite demander l'accès à ses données personnelles dans un jdd, il doit saisir ses données pivot dans un formulaire. La liste des données pivot permet de générer ce formulaire dans le portail.

name: rudi_ext_metadata_ext_selfdata_ext_selfdata_content_selfdata_categories
displayName: Catégorie de données personnelles concernées qui sont dans l'ordre    État civil, identité, données d'identification, images…    Vie personnelle (habitudes de vie, situation familiale, etc.)    Informations d'ordre économique et financier (revenus, situation financière, situation fiscale, etc.)    Données de connexion (adress IP, logs, etc.)    Données de localisation (déplacements, données GPS, GSM, etc.)    Numéro de Sécurité Sociale (ou NIR)
